## Pull Request Checklist

### Security
- [ ] No secrets or credentials committed
- [ ] All security scans passed
- [ ] No critical/high vulnerabilities

### Quality
- [ ] HTML/CSS validated
- [ ] Code tested locally
- [ ] Mobile responsive

### Description
<!-- Describe your changes -->

### Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Security fix
- [ ] Documentation

---
**By submitting, I confirm I followed security guidelines.**
